Public Member Functions

(ARQuaternion) - filterWithInput:weight:

Detailed Description

This implements an elementwise weighted moving average filter for quaternions.

See also:
ARWeightedMovingAverageFilter

Member Function Documentation

- (ARQuaternion) filterWithInput: (ARQuaternion)  input
weight: (double)  weight 

This function takes a new input value, processes it and generates an output value by applying the weighted moving average filter on all elements of the quaternion.

Parameters:
input the current value of the signal
weight the weight of this value.
Returns:
the output of the filter.
